In this addictive game you have to climb up by jumping and pushing off the floor. You need to be fast and agile to get to the top. The game offers many levels of varying difficulty that will allow you to upgrade your skills and become a real climbing master. In addition, the game has beautiful graphics and sound that will immerse you in the exciting world of the game.

In this game you will test your climbing skills. You must jump and push off the floor to get to the top. The game offers many levels of varying difficulty that will allow you to upgrade your skills and become a real climbing master.

You will experience a real adrenaline rush as you climb walls and jump from one platform to another. The game offers many unique tasks and levels of varying difficulty that will make you feel like a real hero.

Enjoy addictive gameplay and become the best climber! Don't miss the opportunity to experience real adrenaline and become a real climbing master!

name: Model Employee
description:
Model Employee is a corporate horror visual novel where players take control of the latest individual amongst millions to start working in one of Tethys' online shopping labyrinthine warehouses. Just discharged from the hospital and massively in debt for their life-saving cybernetics, the player-character must adapt to the "extreme" work-life balance of a Tethys Team Member- but they have help.

Penny, the artificial personality that controls all security, waste disposal, and employee surveillance in the facility, specializes in reinforcing an especially cutthroat variety of workplace culture- and she's taken an interest in you.

With a vibrant cast, PC-98 inspired visuals and multiple endings, Model Employee is a modern horror story that'll stick with you long after you've clocked out of your shift.

If you want to get ahead in your career, you gotta be willing to take some risks.

With a trinity of cherished lives, navigate through the verdant whispers of the old trees, to the gentle cadence of tranquility that accompanies your flight. name: Erix
description:
Erix is a discreet but tremendously addictive game, a game that is inspired by the Arcade game Qix published by Taito in '81 for arcades. After the great success it was, this version for mobile phones arrived in some Sony Ericsson devices.

Erix tests our skill and dexterity, despite the simplicity of its mechanics. The only thing you have to do is cut out rectangular areas on the board until you cut out more or less 75% of the total to go to the next level.

You can make horizontal or vertical movements, while avoiding the obstacles in the game. When you have cut out a rectangle, you capture a portion of the board, we get inside and go for the next cut. Speed is the key. A piece of advice, don't come across anything that moves around the board, it could be your end.

name: Deadliest Demolition

After a humiliating defeat, your supervisor saw it fit to demote you from a cyberdemon to a mere human, so that you can learn to maximize your combat potential instead of squandering your superior firepower. But there's no force in hell that could ever make you part with your beloved weapon...

name: Bloodbaths Terrible Vacation
description: Bloodbath's Terrible Vacation is about my bad experience on a doomed vacation. This wad consists of four small island maps with lots of action. The chaingun, rocket launcher, and plasma gun have all received an upgrade for the adventure. MAP01 is a thrill-seeking adventure to a tropical island, with lots of unsightly guests to contend with. MAP02 is a bit more chill, but still has enough heat so your chaingun does not freeze over. MAP03 is a romp through one of the hottest vacation spots imaginable. MAP04 is a look into how this adventure was booked in the first place.

name: Hotel of the Dead

You realize that you need to get out of the place as quickly as possible. But there's HE waiting outside the main gate. Knowing that you are incapable of confronting this horror now, you have no choice but to take refuge in the hotel building itself. There is no easy way out...

name: Ciudad Empresarial

The map takes you through some kind of apartment complex, up onto the roof, down into the parking lot and finally out on the avenue. It's a mostly straightforward layout, and should take you about 20 minutes to beat blind. ﻿There's a catch though: I've added three new monsters through DeHackEd!

description: Atmospheric tower defense. How many waves can you defend? Basic tower defense in a fantasy setting with gems.

name: Slavs vs. Lizards
description: This is a role-playing game with RPG-survival elements, based on an alternative history of ancient Slavs. You'll also find numerous references and plots based on Slavic mythology and fairy tales. Explore the open game world on your own or with friends.

name: Kerker
description: Kerker is a procedurally generated dungeon crawler FPS roguelike that challenges the player with its varying cast of enemies, exclusive weapons and different dungeon types. Fight your way to riches by slaying foes, obtaining/combining unique abilities and finding forgotten treasures.

name: Homage: Godless Grotto
description: Venture into the unforgiving caverns under the mountain on an impossible quest in this high-fantasy split screen roleplaying game.

name: SCP: Containment Chaos
description: SCP: Containment Chaos is a co-op horror survival game for 1-4 players. Become SCP Foundation agents tasked with containing and researching anomalous entities in parallel universes.

name: Rivers of Blood
description: Alice suffers an accident and wakes up in a parallel world created by her unconscious in a state of coma. Now she needs to find the strength and means to survive and return to the real world, in this new reality that is completely different and much more terrifying than any nightmare.

name: Forever and Ever
description: In this horror-romance visual novel game your choices shape your destiny. Navigate the shadows, unravel the secrets, play with words and determine whom to trust. Will you tell the truth? Or perhaps the lie? Try to see trought others words and you might get rewarded with a good ending... maybe?

name: Pools
description: Liminal space game with focus on eerie exploration and immersion instead of typical horror. Navigate through endless alike rooms. Explore, orient, get out.

name: CoopScoop
description: A chicken virus spreads rapidly across the country and some of your chickens have gotten sick! You need to wash them, feed them and take good care of them to maintain a stable farm. Can you manage all those chickens?

name: New America
description: Solo or multiplayer, capture control points on an alien planet. Choose the number of enemies you face and enjoy sweet conquest.

name: 3Paths
description: It's up to you to decide the fate of 3 girls! What choice will you make in this story of love, friendship and sadness? Adventure through alternate times in this visual novel that gives you a different experience every time you play it again!

name: Out Of Shapes
description: Drop matching shapes on each other to create larger shapes. The more shapes you combine in one drop the higher your combo score. The game ends when you run out of space.

name: Cooktopia
description: Cook and serve your delicious orders as fast as you can. A must try cooking simulator with endless fun!

name: Hermit Simulator
description: Being a hermit is not easy, but it is the way to freedom, where you have to survive and build a new home. Farming, hunting, fishing, gathering, building, crafting, trading and exploration await you in the hermit simulator! Will you be able to survive on your way and become the master of the forest?

name: Mecha Blitz
description: Build mechs and fight in this fast-paced, anime-inspired isometric top down shooter with online multiplayer PvP and single player PvE game modes. Customize your robot fighter with a variety of parts, weapons and cosmetics. Upgrade your equipment, abilities and stats. Battle and win in the arena!

name: Auroria
description: Welcome to Auroria, an open-world, multiplayer, and cooperative sandbox game. Design the Base, survive with your pals, and start your own interstellar travel in a relaxed and fun way.

name: FreeChicken
description: A 3D adventure single-player game for freedom! Test your agility to avoid traps and obstacles as you embark on a journey for freedom! Don't worry, there's a game save function, so start playing right away! Our game supports both English and Korean.

name: Block Catching
description: An online game of block catching with a twist. The catcher is not your friend.

name: Volkolak
description: "Volkolak" is a 2D action game in the dark fantasy world. Immerse yourself in the dark atmosphere of the game and explore mysterious caves and catacombs, the Dead Wastes, the Dark Forest, the Serpent's Backbone and much more. Fight the legendary creatures of Slavic mythology!

name: Side To Side
description: ¡Immerse yourself in this incredible universe and get ready for a challenge by pushing your skills to the limit... Let yourself be carried away by its dazzling effects according to the music!

name: Necrodepths
description: A Dark Fantasy 2.5D Action RPG with a heavy dark atmospheric aesthetic inspired by the once greats. Character customization reminiscent of open world RPGs. Unique races and classes. An endless random, but meaningful, generation of enemies and dungeons, for everlasting Hack n' Slash gameplay.

name: To Infinity
description: To Infinity tells the adventures of a schizophrenic astronaut. The astronaut escapes from the world and goes to search for other planets where he can live with his spaceship, and in the meantime, he constantly makes parkour, witnessing the epic view of the universe.

name: Amber
description: Join Amber on a whimsical journey through the 5 kingdoms: Candy, Cake, Story, Rainbow, and Crystal. Spread love, restore balance with Amber Crystals, confront rulers, and set things right using the Mallet, Chocolate Staff, and Bubblegum Wand. Glide with the Rainbow Umbrella!

name: Halloween Night
description: Halloween Night is a magic brew of card games, board games and dark lord simulator set in a cozy Halloween world. Lead fairytale heroes to explore the Halloween Valley. Craft an unbeatable deck, battle fanciful monsters and become their new lord!

name: Endless Maze
description: Try to get to the end of the maze, if there is one...

name: Vague
description: Vague is a first-person psychological horror inspired by early 2000s classic horror titles. Experience the unsettling atmosphere as you follow Raymond K. Fisher in his search for his missing family.

name: Summer of Love
description: In Summer of Love, you can have a happy ending (Romance Ending or Harem Ending), a neutral ending (Swinging Ending) or a sad ending (Netorare Ending) depending on how you play.

name: Ninja Origin
description: Role-playing game with the best gameplay in the MMORPG series…

name: Monster Coming
description: "Monster Coming" is a fast-paced survivor roguelite game. Dark cracks suddenly appeared in the sky, and a tide of beasts emerged from them to invade humans. You stand up as one of the braves, face the menacing beast tide, choose your equipment, formulate tactics, and feel unparalleled.

name: Watcher Of The Abyss
description: "One day, a mysterious abyssal vortex appeared, unleashing countless monsters set on world destruction. Choose your warriors to guard the abyss. Collect tokens from fallen foes, buy nodes, and strategically place them for ultimate power. Reclaim abyss-covered areas."

name: Type Your Fate
description: Type your fate. Arm yourself with your keyboard and your wits, and try to escape from the abandoned house where you are. Unfortunately, you won't be alone...

name: Rotten Flesh: Cosmic Horror Survival Game
description: Rotten Flesh is a cosmic horror survival game where you have just lost your dog named Roy and you have to find him by shouting for "Roy" on your microphone. Venture deep into the sewers where your dog was lost - however, something else can also hear your screams in the tunnels.

name: Covert Ultra
description: Covert Ultra is an arcade-style tactical shooter, and every level is a lone-wolf terrorist hunt. Play as a high-tech hitman for hire with spider-like abilities and compete to achieve each mission's best time and highest rank. Efficiency is your only priority.

name: Redrum Hotel
description: Redrum Hotel is a short, first-person horror adventure game. Roam around the haunted hotel, collecting strangely scattered notes and avoiding the evil presence that seeks to rid you of your sanity.

name: Alice and The Ancients
description: Advance forward, surpassing all the Ancients on the battlefield!

name: Inventory Master
description: This is a game that focuses on item combination and inventory management. Engage in repeated combinations to aim for the production of top-tier items.

name: Snake Crush Survivors
description: This is a Roguelite game that combines the gameplay of Snake with survivor mechanics. You will play as a large snake roaming above the city, clearing countless small monsters and spirits attracted by spiritual energy, as well as those frenzied large monsters.

name: Final Girl
description: Final GIrl is a turn based adventure paying tribute to the horror movies from the 80's and 90's. Analyse your environment and choose the right interactions. Be creative and unlock new possibilities ... but don't let usefull tools behind, because the bad guys might use them too!

name: Fitting In
description: Sin descripción

name: Pokémon Animon
description: Animon is a pokemon rom hack which replaced every pokemon with anime characters like Digimon, Naruto, One Piece, Dragon Ball, Attack on TItan and many more.

name: Apex Legends: Ignite
description:
Rowenna grew up amidst a war, but in a move that turned the tide, one Monarch Titan sacrificed itself to end the fighting. In the years after, her home planet of Nexus established ties across the Outlands, introducing Rowenna to the Apex Games. The Games represented everything she aspired to–heroism, hard work, sacrifice—and she became a dedicated fan.

When her elder sister Diwa suffered a terrible injury at work, Rowenna resolved to support her family no matter what. She stole the battery from the Monarch, still rusting on the hill, and had a combat rig built with its battery at the core. She used it to qualify for the Apex Games, and even though the battery exposes her to poisonous radiation, she refuses to give up. No one else was going to get hurt to support her family. Rowenna’s choosing to have hope for her dreams or die trying. Now, it’s Conduit’s chance for a day in the sun.

name: Sword and Magic World
description: Sword and Magic World is a free-to-play MMORPG that combines fast action combat and immersive adventures in an open-world experience powered by Game Verse.

name: Chopter Copter
description: Chopter 'til you dropter!

name: Remnant II: The Awakened King
description:
The One True King has awakened and is out for blood. Corrupted by the Root during his near-death slumber, the mad king sees betrayal at every turn and is on a rampage of revenge. Since his castle first arrived in a Dran coastal town, the tides are angry and the weather is chaotic, surfacing all manner of creatures from the depths and leaving many mysteries in its wake.

This DLC adds the Ritualist archetyp, a new storyline, dungeons and area based in the world of Losomn. It includes a wide array of new weapons, modifications, amulets, and rings along with new bosses, characters and fearsome creatures to encounter.

name: TSR Halloween Party
description: The cast of The Smoke Room prepare for a Halloween corn maze in a modern day AU.

name: Honkai: Star Rail - The Crepuscule Zone
description:
Version 1.5 of Honkai: Star Rail, which includes:
• New characters: Huohuo, Argenti and Hanya
• New area: Fyxestroll Garden
• New trailblaze mission
• New companion mission for Argenti
• Simulated Universe update (World 8) and new enemies
• New main event: A Foxian Tale of the Haunted
• …and more!

name: Ion Fury + Aftershock
description: Sin descripción

name: Filthy Us: Complete Edition
description: Filthy Us: Complete Edition is an original horror adventure game with a dark story and puzzle elements. The game not only contains a large number of Buddhist and oriental elements, but also the horrifying customs of the people who used to live in that world.

name: Dinobreak Strange Mutations Collection
description: Experience the entire Dinobreak and Outbreak series!

name: Super Mario World: The Second Reality Project
description: Overshadowed by its 2008 remake, this first edition of The Second Reality Project is an SMW romhack known for it's creative level design and challenge. Unlike its remake, the graphics and music are vanilla.

name: My Singing Monsters: Beat Hereafter Skin Pack
description: Unlock the Beat Hereafter Island Skin available on Bone Island. Alongside the cosmetic makeover to Bone Island, you'll receive a variety of boosts to Bone Island.

name: Sonic Dream Team
description: In this all-new Sonic adventure, the evil Dr. Eggman has discovered The Reverie, an ancient device with the power to manifest dreams in the real world. Navigate twisted dreamscapes, rescue your friends, and put a stop to Dr. Eggman’s nightmarish dreams of world domination!

name: Banjo Kazooie: Tooty Adventure
description:
Tooty Adventure is a Banjo Kazooie mod that reverse the roles with
Banjo together with a new story, custom scenes and mechanics.

Mod is console compatible with the expansion pack.

name: Coke
description: Developed by Swift Software and released in 1989, the goal is to shoot Coke cans to score points before the "Thirst" counter reaches 9.

name: Gabrielle's Monster Match
description: Sin descripción

name: Reel Fishing Pocket
description: Sin descripción

name: Gabrielle's Zombie Attack
description: Sin descripción

name: Gabrielle's Sweet Defense
description: Sin descripción

name: Ninja Climb
description: Sin descripción

name: Blastar
description:
A homebrew port of Blastar, developed by Elon Musk (at the age of 12) for the Spectravision in 1984.

In this game you have to destroy an alien space freighter, which is carrying deadly Hydrogen Bombs and Status Beam Machines. This game make good use of sprites and animation, and in this sense makes the listing worth checking out.

name: Adventures to Go
description: Sin descripción

name: Minecraft: Tricky Trials
description: Tricky Trials is an update for Minecraft: Bedrock Edition filled with daring adventures and surprising rewards. Hunt for the trial chambers, and take on the challenge that awaits you in this sprawling copper structure. Fight off unfamiliar foes like the bogged and the breeze in your hunt for an elusive trial key! Then unlock your reward from the vault, a block that makes adventuring fun for every player, no matter the size of your party.

name: ShmupSpeed
description: Sin descripción

name: Baker Street Breakouts
description:
"Baker Street Breakouts" combines the thrill of an Escape Room with the storytelling of an Adventure. Use your superior deduction skills in this story-driven mystery to help Sherlock deducing his way through an old film studio to finally face his arch nemesis Moriarty. Become a Master of Deduction!

"Baker Street Breakouts" focusses on puzzles and deduction. Instead of combat or grinding, the game challenges players to use their superior deduction skills and the ability to combine items in order to solve riddles and progress through the game. Explore, investigate, combine, deduce!

name: Hopman
description: Sin descripción

name: Buzzy Bee
description: The game works similar to Flappy-Bird in that tapping X increases the bee's speed up.

name: No Place To Hide
description:
No Place To Hide is a minigames collection for the NDS, inspired by a flash game where you have to dodge the blue shapes as they appear on stage.

In each game you must avoid letting your character get touched by any of the baddies.

They increase in both speed and numbers as the game goes on, so stay on your toes. Also look out for the tribute to the old arcade classics and home computer raves!

Avoid, avoid again, scores!

There are a total of 10 minigames all in different themes, as well as a WiFi mode for the online high scores.

name: Slide Boy in Maze Land
description: Sin descripción

name: Meatball Dog
description: meatball dog is about a dog eating meatballs.

name: Maido Manie
description: White Rabbit Maid Café, owned by Iiko Shinkaichi, is losing money because there is a better Maid Café next door! What would be a better idea than to send her feminine younger brother to work there as a maid to find out their secrets?

name: Pac-Man Escape
description:
This is a complete reworking of Game Boy Lock ‘N Chase into a very fun Pac-Man game called “Pac-Man Escape“. Can Pac-Man rescue Ms. Pac-Man from the evil ghosts??

All of the graphics have received a nice Pac-Man style facelift. Including the 4 different types of ghost.

The 2 doors at your disposal on each maze now stay permanently shut. (They only lasted a few seconds in the original Lock ‘N Chase.) This adds more strategy to the gameplay. If you trap a ghost inside of these 2 doors you will recieve bonus points. Which also makes the rest of that maze easier. But be sure to not trap yourself… you will have to restart if you do!

name: Space Rescue in Jupiter
description:
In the year 2070, the Earth's energy resources are not sufficient for the great demand of a booming overpopulation; new technologies and materials have allowed the extraction of energy in the upper layers of Jupiter's atmosphere. From time to time, accidents occur in the mining-energy complexes that exist around the planet. Your mission is to rescue the miners if necessary. Control the descent of your ship, avoiding the clouds of overheated plasma, to land on the platforms and collect the capsules to take them to the space station.

This game has a basic concept, it is made in Basic 1.0 with additions of machine subroutines, it consists of 5 levels and has an ending.

name: Hissatsu Pachi-Slot Station 5: Invaders 2000
description:
The pachinko machines are japanese slot gambling machines used for amusement and prizes. Although pachinko machines were originally strictly mechanical, modern pachinko machines are a cross between a pinball machine and a video slot machine.

There are many types of pachinko machines and parlor regulations, but most of them conform to a similar style of play. Players can buy metal balls by either inserting either cash, a pre-paid card, or their member's card directly into the machine they want to use. At 4 yen per ball that's 250 balls for every 1000 yen. These balls are then shot into the machine from a ball tray with the purpose of attempting to win more balls. The pachinko machine has a digital slot machine on a large screen in the center of its layout, and the objective here is to get 3 numbers or symbols in a row for a jackpot.

Hissatsu Pachi-Slot Station 5 - Invader 2000 is a pachinko slot machine simulator that features a pachinko slot machine (Invader 2000) made by Baltec.

name: BLT Blast
description: You are a magical flying stick of bacon! Press FIRE to launch an all organic torpedo. Move using the joystick. Game speed will increase with time. Colliding with the ant, fly or lettuce will deduct a life. When all 6 lives are gone the game is over. Below is a description of each object you can interact with.

name: Volleyring
description:
Hedgehogs cannot play volleyball because their spines might pierce the ball.
Instead they choose volleyring - essentially the same game, but using a ring
from Sonic's universe. The rules are simple: send a ring to opponent's side,
don't touch the net or ground. Hedgehog have to jump to strike the ring, but
three consecutive contacts with it is a fault. Match is played to 15 points.

Left player is Sonic the Hedgehog, right player is Shadow the Hedgehog. Both
are controlled by players using joysticks or cursor keys. Press [ 1 ] in the
main menu to choose Sonic's controls, press [ 2 ] to pick Shadow's controls.
Press [ S ] to start match. Note that there is an easter egg in the game!

name: DragonBasic Space Invaders
description: Developed by fjsantos in 2003, this is a Space Invaders clone developed using DragonBasic.

name: Gomoku
description: The game of Gomoku written for 8-bit computers using cc65

name: Jacks or Better
description: Video poker for Atari 7800

name: Submarine
description:
A port of the 1975 PC-50X Game Submarine, similar type games were also in the arcade and are ports themselves from Electromechanical games.

Choose either the Submarine (Blue) or Destroyer (Green) and attempt to shoot each other with missiles. Submarine can also hit the Escort (Red) ship that is protected by the Destroyer.

Plunging down the controller fires, Push Left / Right for Left and Right movement on screen respectively. Game ends when one side reaches 15 points.

name: WonderCell
description: This is a version of FreeCell for the Bandai Wonderswan - both mono and colour!

name: Busty Bunny the Bounty Babe
description:
You are Busty, a buxom bunny bounty babe, looking to nab the ultimate score, a gang boss named Fanny Fennec, leader of the Fanny Pack. You land your 57 star cruiser spacecraft on the outskirts of Delta city on the planet 6-9. instantly you can see evidence of the gang. Propaganda posters litter the streets, urging people to join the pack or submit to it. Then you see them. Fennecs start to emerge from the dark, trash-filled alleyways. They glare at you menacingly. They know who you are and why you are here, and they are not going to go easy on you. Get ready for the fight of your life!

Survive the onslaught of enemies and get to the goal sign at the end of each level! pick up Bimbo-Cola to refill your health! 18 levels spread across 6 unique zones, with 3 amazing boss battles!

name: BattlePlan!
description: Where fun meets chaos: Set in Pixel Vault's mashup universe, step in, apply your strategy and compete in our 3v3 auto-battler.

name: Wormwood: Expanded Universe
description: A sequel to 2019's Wormwood, Expanded Universe is another Halloween-themed collaboration between Grain of Salt and Ribbiks

name: Wormwood III: The Horror
description: A sequel to Wormwood: Expanded Universe by Grain of Salt and Ribbiks.

name: Cut the Rope 3
description:
Twelveth entry in Cut the Rope series. Cut the Rope is a series of physics-based puzzle video games developed by ZeptoLab for several platforms and devices.

Cut the Rope 3 focuses on Om Nom and his son, Nibble Nom setting out on a journey to discover new Nommies. The gameplay replaces pieces of candy with Nibble Nom, who must reach Om Nom's location in each level. The game features four locations, with the location that the player explores being selected by Om Nom's compass. In each search for a Nommie, the player will go through three random levels in order to take a picture of every new creature. It also features 3D graphics, similar to Cut the Rope Remastered.

name: Wormwood IV: The Final Chapter
description: A 10-level Halloween-themed wad for Doom II, Wormwood IV features maps by Ribbiks, Grain of Salt, and dannebubinga.

name: Wormwood V
description: The fifth entry in the Wormwood series of Doom II wads, featuring maps by Grain of Salt and Ribbiks.

name: The Police Mystery
description: The police have arrested dangerous criminals from the neighborhood and sent them to jail. During their time in jail, one of them was a witch who casted a spell to shrink many police officers to the size of an ant. The tinies now need to get a giantess police woman's attention before it's too late.

name: Grove
description: A 1-level wad for Doom II created by Bernard "B.P.R.D" de Windt, Grove was one of the winners of the 2004 Cacowards and placed 97th in Doomworld's "Top 100 Most Memorable Maps," receiving recognition for its puzzles and atmosphere.

name: Tenohira de Higurashi ga Naku
description: Tenohira de Higurashi ga Naku is an officially licensed program that allows users to convert and play their Higurashi no Naku Koro ni Question Arcs on a Game Boy Advance.

name: Silent Hill: Ascension
description:
Silent Hill: Ascension is a thrilling new, Genvid Interactive Streaming Series where you, along with the rest of the audience can impact the canon of Silent Hill.

The Hernandez family plummets into chaos as another death shakes their decimated rust-belt town in Pennsylvania. In a dying fishing village in Norway, the uneasy peace of the Johansen family is upended when their matriarch, Ingrid, dies under suspicious circumstances. Survival depends on them overcoming their darkest impulses and the machinations of a cult, as they discover the horror that connects them.

Will they face redemption, suffering or damnation? you decide.

name: Euro Truck Simulator 2: Greece
description: Explore the charm of inland Greece and discover enchanting islands, with approx. 14 cities waiting to be discovered. Picture yourself cruising through postcard-perfect villages, navigating winding roads, and passing iconic landmarks, immersing yourself in the centuries-old tapestry of Greek culture.

name: Misutonia no Kibou: The Lost Delight
description:
A otome game by Otomate set to release in 2024.

A fairy tale of love, obsession, and emotion woven together by descendants of fairies.

name: Moeyo! Otome Doushi: Kayu Koigatari
description:
An upcoming otome game by Otomate.

A young lady monk apprentice who lives in Kayuu, a country known for its martial arts, somehow ends up protecting the country!? What is her fate and the future of the country…?

name: Mix Dunk: King of Basketball
description: A new project in collaboration between B.LEAGUE’s professional basketball club Kawasaki Brave Thunders, the idol group AKB48, and the otome game brand Otomate.

name: Over Requiemz
description:
“Whatever pain awaits, I won’t regret this choice.”

A dark fantasy game about overcoming grief as you wander into the “Land of Oz.”

name: Trouble Magia: Wakeari Shoujo wa Mirai wo Kachitoru Tame ni Ikoku no Mahou Gakkou e Ryuugaku Shimasu
description:
Girl meets boy in this adolescent tale of magic. Your year to seize the future is about to begin!

In search of clues to break the curse that causes her to abruptly transform into an animal, the protagonist decides to study abroad at the Reveal Academy of Magic. Will she be able to break the curse while dealing with all sorts of trouble?

name: M-PS2Craft
description: M-PS2Craft is an unofficial version of Minecraft for the PlayStation 2.

name: Robot Fight
description: Robot Fight is an Action game, published by Homevision, which was released in 1983.

name: Bubblegum Crisis: Crime Wave
description: A game for PC-88 & 98, set in Megatokyo and featuring Knight Sabers as the main characters.

name: Taimanin RPG Extasy
description: Super-popular Taimanin RPG is now available on Steam! The Taimanin take the stage in a classic turn-based RPG! Commander Skills, Formations, and Ultimate Skills... Make good use of them and be victorious! Battle alongside Taimanin whenever you want! From this day forth, you're a Taimanin!

name: Hello Kitty no Gotouchi Collection: Koi no DokiDoki Trouble
description: A DS game, developed and published by Rocket Company, which was released in Japan in 2007.

name: Friday Night Funkin': vs. Impostor - Human Hijinks
description: Friday Night Funkin': vs. Impostor - Human Hijinks is a re-envisioning of Friday Night Funkin': vs. Impostor by Clowfoe, turning the Among Us crewmates and impostors into humans.

name: Sumo Tatami
description: Welcome to the uproarious world of Sumo Tatami, where bumbling sumo wrestlers take center stage in a plethora of zany and competitive platformer modes! Brace yourself for a side-splitting, body-slamming adventure as you go head-to-head with your friends and adversaries in races, king-of-the-hill battles, duels, bowling, golf, and more.

name: Hitman 3: Ambrose Island
description:
Ambrose Island is a brand new location for HITMAN 3, and a major release as part of our ‘Year 2‘ plans. It’s available now as a free download, included with the July Patch.

Embark on a new adventure with Agent 47 to a secluded island in the Andaman Sea. Located north from the Strait of Malacca, Ambrose Island is an isolated harbour packed full of dense vegetation, hidden coves, twisting paths and perilous bridges.

From the lit torches that illuminate narrow passageways, to the neon lights that flicker over the bustle of Farah’s bar, there’s a sense of discovery around every corner.

name: Invasion
description: Sin descripción

name: Arcade Archives: Daioh
description:
Enemy down!
Enemy down!
Take them all down!

name: Merge Games Adventure Bundle 2
description: Sin descripción

name: The Unwanted War
description: Fight battles through human history, defeat your enemies and save humanities future! The Unwanted War lets you follow history itself and take influence on humanities ultimate fate. Are you going to use your knowledge and power for good or will you bring doom over the human race?

name: Sunland Town
description: Welcome to Sunland Town  a serene and mystical walking simulator. Explore a captivating world as you search for hidden items, unlock secrets, and immerse yourself in the beauty of this unique town!

name: OhMyRace!
description: OhMyRun! is a competitive platformer game playable up to 10 players. Face off against your friends in wacky races using powers and be the first to finish in a frenzied competition!

name: Hypnosis Card
description: Hypnosis Cards is a deck-building game that introduces a novel concept of parts. Players can use numerous cards to engage in card battles with five girls.

name: Clayverse
description: Embark on an epic quest in the extraordinary world of Clayverse. Mold your clay hero, master crafting, and explore a mesmerizing multiverse. Engage in tactical clay combat inspired by classic MMORPGs, and experience gory claymation for a thrilling, darkly humorous twist.

name: CoinBlock Clicker
description: CoinBlock Clicker is an idle clicker with a unique way of merging idle and clicker fun into one game! You simply click thousands of times on the coinblock and make those coins fly all over your screen!

name: Last Hour of an Epic to the Moon RPG
description: You like RPGs, but don't have time to play it all. . . We like RPGs, but don't have time to make it all. . . So here's (only) the last hour of an Epic RPG !!

name: Dark Age Gladiator
description: Dark Age Gladiator is a dark fantasy world where you live as a gladiator fighting in the arena for wealth and fame. The opponents are not limited to humans, but also include a variety of monsters.

name: The Energy Warrior
description: Sin descripción

name: Don't Shoot Us
description: Don't Shoot Us is a solo FPS that tells the story of a tactical soldier from the point of view of his body camera. Try to survive as long as possible against the hordes of infected of all kinds.

name: Legend of Inca: Mystical Culture
description: Countless secrets entwine around the mystical people of the Incas ... Create an Inca settlement and build all the vital structures and production facilities!

name: Retro Rally!
description: Get ready to embark on a nostalgic journey back to the golden era of arcade gaming with Retro Rally! This top-down racing game pays homage to the classic arcade racers of yesteryears, offering an adrenaline-pumping experience that will have you hooked from the moment you hit the accelerator.

name: Stories in Glass: Winter
description: Piece together winter magic in 40 stained-glass puzzles.

name: Let's Catapult
description: Let's Catapult is an exciting game that brings back the nostalgia of childhood memories.

name: Project Apoceus
description: Step into Project Apoceus, a large scale fantasy RTS game that brings back the feeling of old school.

name: Battle Poet
description: Battle demons with poetry to reclaim the Holy Mountain in this Strategy Roguelike about combining lines of poetry in turn-based combat.

name: Magic Cards Solitaire 2: The Fountain of Life
description: Experience a new, exciting solitaire adventure with Wizard Knoxford - now in the land of the elves! A life-giving artifact, the "Source of Life", is slowly losing its magic and threatens to go out. Unimagined effects on the inhabitants of the elven land would be the result.

name: Anaphora
description: Anaphora is a miniature movement shooter with rogue-lite elements that takes place in a single small arena.

name: Visual novel for the kids: Lumi And Baby - Hamster And Baby Dragon
description: Read an interactive bedtime story with your children, a tale of a positive hamster called Lumi and his friend a baby dragon. Lumi and Baby lost their homes and all the animals in the forest help them. Made for children aged 5-8.

name: Downhill Girl

The game was intended to be a joke and not to be taken seriously.

name: Super Mario Bros HF
description:
Hello there! You’re probably here because you’re looking for a fun hack of Super Mario Bros, right? If so, Super Mario Bros HF could be just for you. Perhaps the main focus of SMBHF is the difficulty. Most hacks that redo levels (at least the ones that I’ve tried) make the game nearly impossible! I’ve had quite a few games where I couldn’t get past the first few levels without savestates. In my opinion, games like these are just not fun. How can you enjoy a game if you have to keep saving after each major jump? I don’t think you can.

That is why SMBHF’s levels are about as difficult as the original game’s. You will NOT find ultra-hard levels in SMBHF; if you can beat Super Mario Bros, you can beat SMBHF. These levels were created for the gamer’s enjoyment, not for the gamer’s frustration. Each level (1-1 through 8-4) has been changed. Some have been changed moreso than others, but each has been significantly altered.

The lesser focus of SMBHF is graphic changing. Some major graphic changes include: New floor tile, New underwater tile, New “?” blocks, New brick graphics (Borrowed from SMB2J), and others. There are also some minor graphic changes that you may notice throughout the game. (And yes, those lines on Mario’s face are longer sideburns.)

A lot of things has ben modified: All graphics (backgrounds and sprites), all map, text and music; to look like Metroid 2. Unarmored samus sprites were based on rogue dawn hack.

However, they can't find Lis, and worried, Mike jumps down the pipe she used and reaches the laboratory, where they will have to work together to escape together. At the same time, Charlie travels to the town hidden in Rod's van to find something to help his sister with.

name: My Time at Sandrock: Pet Pack - Lil Gecko
description: Travel to the desert community of Sandrock and take on the role of a fledgling Builder. Use your trusty toolset to gather resources, construct machines, and turn your run-down workshop into a well-oiled production facility to save the town from the jaws of economic ruin!

name: My Time at Sandrock: Far East Furniture Pack
description: Contains 10 elegant pieces of Oriental-style furniture.

name: Deep Treasure
description: A 3D third-person dungeon crawling game. Arm yourself with useful equipment and items to find the hidden deep treasure.

name: Slip & Skid
description: Race against your friends and alter the track by placing obstacles after each lap. Drift, boost and jump with your physics-based car. Change the surfaces of the road and obstacles during the race. Up to 4 players online or in local split-screen.

name: Songs of Everjade
description: Explore a mythical world of Chinese high fantasy in this fast-paced action-packed roguelite. Slash your way through enemies, avoid perilous traps, dash out of harm’s way, collect hundreds of items, and build your own playstyle.

name: The Sims 4: For Rent
description: Bring the neighbours together (literally) and experience multi-family lots as a tenant or property owner in The Sims 4 For Rent Expansion Pack. Purchase now to get bonus items** to bring the Night Market home for your Sims.

name: Tiny Balls
description: Tiny Balls is a multiplayer party game in which up to 16 friends can play against each other. In the three modes, players control a marble and must either push their friends off the track in a heated race, play a game of tag, or be the last to survive on a platform by pushing their friends off.

name: La Malédiction
description: La malédiction is a French adventure video game developed by Fabien Privat for the Amstrad CPC and published in 1991 by Lankhor. In the game, a wizard named Xarton casts a curse upon the forest of Enar. The game was met with polarized reviews upon release.

name: Cozy Space Survivors
description: A cozy time survival roguelite in space. You steer the shippy while the shooting happens automatically. Meet cute NPCs, solve small quests, and fight quirky enemies with satisfying weapons. A short experience for people who don't have much time but love playing (and finishing) games.

name: Hyper Mirror Run
description: Race head-to-head in the exciting world of HYPER MIRROR RUN. Compete locally with your friends or challenge an AI opponent. Navigate through mirrored worlds, mastering precision jumps and wielding weapons to triumph over foes. Dive into this 2D platformer for fast-action and a lot of fun!

name: Spotless
description: Clean, Clash, and Collect across the crummiest corners of this Single-Player Rogue-Lite. Spend your meager earnings wisely on both permanent and temporary upgrades, so that even the thriving haunts of cute and creepy creatures can’t stop you from cleaning until everything is Spotless!

name: Minesweeper Collector 2
description: Minesweeper with a story and detailed tutorials! Each level you pass is an item that changes the game world and advances you through the storyline. You will find collections, crafting and level chains, it will be fun!

name: Piron Virus
description: In the apocalypse caused by the Prion virus, you need to manipulate your four companions to survive in your shelter. When facing survivors like you, killing or assisting is up to you to decide. You can choose to live a miserable life, or you can choose to find a way to save everyone.

name: To the Basement
description: "To the Basement" offers an exciting journey in the world of robots, where players can explore mysterious locations, overcome difficulties on their way and fight with hostile machines.

name: Space Strider
description: Space Strider is a 2D Sidescroller Shoot 'em up with Roguelite elements, where you beat hordes of enemies and defeat unique bosses. Unlock, upgrade and level up your Spaceships to become the ultimate Space Strider!

name: Vangaro Tactics
description: Command colorful troops into tactical turn-based battles in Vangaro Tactics! Infiltrate enemy outposts on the Stealth Missions: mine, recruit, move wisely, and you'll stand a chance. Know your commanders and exclusive units to make the most of each faction.

name: Kiloparsec Uprising
description: Kiloparsec Uprising is a strategy game with turn-based spaceship combat on a hex grid and RPG elements. Fight against the Empire's ships to overthrow the government and secure peace and justice in the galaxy.

name: Crossing Frontier: Fate Foretold
description: Crossing Frontier is a side-scroll action game with brawling elements, , featuring multiplayer PVP content and the thrilling combat! Bring your A-Game and join the fight!

name: Backwoods
description: You will survive in forest,build your base, craft items and grow crops.

name: Arts & Hearts Academy
description: Arts & Hearts Academy: first dark academia romantic visual novel with a detective storyline, where you play as an architecture student, and your goal is to win an architectural competition, uncover a mysterious crime at the academy, and find love. Are you ready? Let's get started!

name: Alien Slayer
description: A top-down rogue-like shooter. Customize your weapons with looted upgrades to stay alive as long as possible.

name: Brazil Fencing Club VR
description: The Brazil Fencing Club has nine world-class foil fencers ready to challenge you. Test your fencing skill and see if it holds up against these wacky fencers. Use actual real world fencing skills in a virtual reality game that closely simulates actual real world foil fencing.

name: Daria: A Kingdom Simulator
description: Daria: A Kingdom Simulator is an epic 125,000-word interactive fantasy novel by Mike Walter, where your choices control the story. It's entirely text-based—without graphics or sound effects—and fueled by the vast, unstoppable power of your imagination.

name: Welcome to Primrose Lake 2
description: The mystery continues in the highly anticipated sequel to Welcome to Primrose Lake!

name: Shin Pokémon: Blue Version
description: Started in 2018 by a secret cabal of ancient Pokemon nerds, Shin Pokemon is an enhancement ROM hack of Pokemon Red & Blue that aims to be the ultimate remaster fans never got. It is a mostly-vanilla hack that focuses on fixing game engine bugs and oversights from the original game. Additionally, trainer AI routines are improved and multiple quality-of-life enhancements have been added. It also acts as a kind of research-informed speculative work that interprets what the 2016 Nintendo Virtual Console re-release of Gen-1 Pokemon could have been. It is the image of a glitch-free experience with player-friendly goodies and enhancements common to other modern remasterings.

name: Shin Pokemon: Red Version
description: Started in 2018 by a secret cabal of ancient Pokemon nerds, Shin Pokemon is an enhancement ROM hack of Pokemon Red & Blue that aims to be the ultimate remaster fans never got. It is a mostly-vanilla hack that focuses on fixing game engine bugs and oversights from the original game. Additionally, trainer AI routines are improved and multiple quality-of-life enhancements have been added. It also acts as a kind of research-informed speculative work that interprets what the 2016 Nintendo Virtual Console re-release of Gen-1 Pokemon could have been. It is the image of a glitch-free experience with player-friendly goodies and enhancements common to other modern remasterings.

name: Shin Pokemon: Green Version
description: Started in 2018 by a secret cabal of ancient Pokemon nerds, Shin Pokemon is an enhancement ROM hack of Pokemon Red & Blue that aims to be the ultimate remaster fans never got. It is a mostly-vanilla hack that focuses on fixing game engine bugs and oversights from the original game. Additionally, trainer AI routines are improved and multiple quality-of-life enhancements have been added. It also acts as a kind of research-informed speculative work that interprets what the 2016 Nintendo Virtual Console re-release of Gen-1 Pokemon could have been. It is the image of a glitch-free experience with player-friendly goodies and enhancements common to other modern remasterings.

name: My Time at Sandrock: Interior Decorator Pack
description: Contains 8 floor designs, 8 wallpapers, and 4 roof designs to build your perfect home.

name: My Time at Sandrock: Builder's Beach and Ball Clothing Pack
description: Includes swimsuits and ball attire for your builder; each set comes in 4 different colors that you can mix and match. A set includes a top, a bottom, headwear, shoes, and 3 accessories.

name: FireChess
description: Unleash a new level of chess tactics with mage pieces that create fires, fog of war, portals, freeze opponents, and much more. Strengthen your army by purchasing additional pieces (standard or mage) when you earn income from occupying gold spaces.

name: ArenaWar
description: FPS Arena Competitive multiplayer

name: Ballapalooza
description: Roll around and collect rings to progress through several levels with various abilities. Become a true baller!

name: Bulletz
description: Bulletz is a chaotic local multiplayer twin stick shooter with over 40 guns and levels. You play a series of rounds in destructible levels trying to kill your opponents with guns that randomly spawn. The first player to 10 kills wins the match!

name: The Puzzle Maker: Cebba's Odyssey
description: Solve and create fantastical puzzles in The Puzzle Maker: Cebba's Odyssey! Follow the tale of Cebba the Puzzle Maker as you take on her many trials to inherit her title. Use the unique abilities of friendly units to manipulate and destroy enemy monsters. Become the next great Puzzle Maker!

name: Otherlights
description: Otherlights is an action-RPG game with roguelike tendencies designed for 1 to 4 players. In this sunless world, unlock many heroes and develop their destinies to try to access the solar fragment guarded by the powerful Exharques.

name: Brotherhood
description: An old-school shooter inspired by Wolfenstein 3D. You are one of the prisoners of an ancient prison. There is no one to help you. You only have yourself to rely on. Your shotgun. Against hordes of enemies. Animal rage and the desire to kill. Destroy Them All!

name: Art of Rally: Australia
description: Jump back behind the wheel with the Art of Rally: Australia DLC, and buckle up for a memorable off-road adventure as we take you on a tour down under. 6 rally stages & 1 freeroam location. 4 new cars, 2 new tunes.

name: Uki-Uki-Tengoku 2
description: Retro 2D side-scrolling shooter with pixel art. Control a penguin (Laser), a fish (Firebreath), and a human (Railgun) to achieve a high score!

name: Construction Simulator: Spaceport Expansion
description: Ever dreamed of contributing to the exploration of the universe? Then add the Spaceport Expansion to your Construction Simulator!

name: Panda Go
description: This is a turn-based puzzle board game where you need to cleverly navigate your character through guards and various obstacles to reach the endpoint! Additionally, you can use the level editor to create your own levels and share them with the community or download levels created by other players!

name: Summer Fantasy
description: It is a story of going forward together with childhood sweetheart monsters and saving each other, accompanying each other to experience those sparkling youthful times that are both troublesome and joyful. There is unparalleled passion and warmth in the daily life of fighting and teasing each other.

name: Power Punch
description: A multiplayer online game where you can enjoy boxing and happy sports in the battle royale arena. On the way to become the boxing king! We'll not afraid of opponent! but afraid of break the TV at home!

name: Rose
description: “The journalist who lost his daughter unveils the veil of truth with his light.”

name: Bragnarok
description: Dance in the spotlight and push others out of it!

name: Golfing In Aether: Dustbowl
description: The fourth free expansion to Golfing in Aether, introducing a sandy, dusty environment along with several new levels.

name: Moi Moi Heroes
description: Moi Moi Heroes offers a wacky adventure on Moi Moi Island! Team up for wild co-op puzzles to reach King Moi Moi's crown, engage in royal tag battles to steal it from your friends, and return it to the King to score. Become the ultimate "Moi Moi Hero" in this uproarious showdown!

name: Father of AI
description: Father of AI is an atmospheric 2D adventure that tells the story of a nuclear apocalypse survivor and his robot companion A.L.A.N. Work together with A.L.A.N to navigate the harsh terrain, and train him in the art of hand-to-hand combat to fight against the mutant enemies of the wasteland.

name: Path of Dragoon
description: Path of Dragoon is a Fantasy RPG that is inspired by Dragon Warrior and Final Fantasy. When not completing the Main Quest, you can restore the Kingdom by completing quests for villagers. You can Mine, Fish, and Explore the world to discover powerful items and abilities.

name: Is This Game Trying to Kill Me?
description: An old shack deep in a dense forest, a strange computer and a game that's trying to kill you!

name: Trophy Hunt
description: Trophy Hunt is a silly multiplayer game all about stealing and defending trophies from your friends!

name: Deadly Contagion
description: In 2006, three forest rangers and a mysterious ABIN agent are sent to a mansion in a small town. Upon arrival, strange events begin to unfold. Manage your inventory, investigate the mysteries of the mansion, and survive if you can.

name: Office Nightmare: Chapter 1
description: Your boss trapped you in your office and you need to escape so you need to find a way out by solving puzzles, exploring the place, fight monsters, finding keys and more

name: Disney Dreamlight Valley: A Rift in Time
description: Expand your journey to Eternity Isle, where more adventures await!

name: Track Racing: The Holy Rosary
description: Drive along the race tracks and do some parkour in first person to get your objective. Try to pass all the obstacles in parkour to reach to the objective. God Loves you :)

name: The Quest of the Tiny Hero
description: Embark on a valiant quest in "The Quest of The Tiny Hero," a 2D top-down RPG where you craft, battle, and explore your way to becoming the hero of your village.

name: Escort's Secrets 18+
description: Escort's Secrets 18+ is a captivating visual novel that follows the story of Hensel, a complete underachiever and a cheerful adventurer, who possesses an extraordinary talent for charming and doing the opposite.

name: Whispers of the Citadel
description: Immerse yourself in a kingdom's turmoil. Love, power, and destiny intertwine as you, a valiant soldier gifted with the citadel, navigate a precarious path to the throne. With the king's demise and no heir in sight, you must find a bride in just one month. Choose from five captivating partners.

name: Cosplay Relaxation
description: A massage parlor where your "relationship points" change the services available. There's an outfit for each "treatment" plan you need the most!

name: Lilim Wants to Lv Up
description: One night a beautiful girl suddenly appeared in my room, not only dressed in cool and sexy clothes, but also with horns and a tail.The self-proclaimed succubus Lilim came to the human world to become stronger, and my hoarded sexual desire was the perfect target for her.

name: Giddy Up Horse Racing
description: Giddy Up Horse Racing is a retro-inspired rhythm game. Blaze a trail across diverse tracks and locations, all set to a funky and uplifting soundtrack. It features different game modes, a track creator, leaderboards and a ghost replay system. See you on the tracks!

name: Pro Yakyuu: Greatest Nine 98
description: Pro Yakyuu: Greatest Nine 98, is a baseball game for the Sega Saturn, sequel to Pro Yakyuu Greatest Nine 97.

name: Fortnite: Chapter 4 - Season OG
description:
Drop in the original Island once again in Fortnite Battle Royale Chapter 4 Season OG. Throughout “Fortnite OG,” each major update will bring a different phase of Battle Royale’s past, starting with Chapter 1 Season 5. That means Shopping Carts, ATKs, the Assault Rifle, Pump Shotgun, and more in both Battle Royale and Zero Build!

Go back in time Season by Season. Some of the unvaulted gear in each update will remain for that update, be in more than one update, or stay for the rest of Fortnite OG!

name: Miss Paint: Part 1
description:
To start us off, a bit of Athenian trivia. "Peristeri" is a real area of Athens, and the Greek word for "pigeon".

You will find pigeons in this fictional version of Peristeri - or, rather, they will find you - but were we to name this godforsaken place after the creature that populates it most densely, we really should call it "Cops".

Cops are a part of this story. Homeless men are a part of this story. Young artists who suffer menial part-time jobs to fund their creative pursuits are a part of this story. The protagonist of this story, however, is a middle-aged woman named Iris.

You would call Iris a protagonist, but you would never call her a hero, especially not to her face. If you called Iris a hero, she might actually die. Why? Because, God, she's no hero, am I? I mean, is she? Let me answer that: she's not. In fact, she's nobody, really. A totally unexceptional, deeply conservative, borderline detached shadow of a person who'd just like some paint. Pai--? Sorry, I meant paint. No. Not paint. I was gonna say she just wants some--

P a i n t.

name: The Smiling Man: Remake
description:
It's back! In this remake you can play through the real story told by Blue Tidal, as well as the alternative story, which is a recreation of the first game. In this remake too, the music and sounds have been recreated, with each ending having its own music.

The suspense part of the game was inspired by some famous horror movies from the 80s/90s.

As the main story is based on the real story of Blue Tidal, it ends up being very short, unlike the alternative story which is a recreation and reimagining of the first game.

name: Dead or Alive 5: Last Round - Core Fighters Character: Honoka
description: This DLC will unlock a new character: Honoka!

name: Enspell
description: “Enspell” is deck building-RogueLike game based on a medieval fantasy where you unravel secrets and explore to seek treasures. While you fight against monsters in dangerous dungeons, you can collect trophies and make your own deck.

name: Puzzle Cube
description: Solve the 3x3 cube from a 2D perspective and set a record time! Tutorial video available on YouTube via in-game link. Various backgrounds, music, and cube skins to customize the experience. Timer can be turned off for learning or casual play. Online leaderboards track best times.

name: My Time at Sandrock: Deluxe Edition
description: Celebrate the ultimate My Time at Sandrock experience with the exclusive Bundle!

name: Horse Tales: Emerald Valley Ranch - The Arabian Horse Pack
description: Continue your experience by bringing a brand new horse breed into your stable: The legendary Arabian thoroughbred!

name: Big Screen Games: Pack 2
description: Time to bring the party into your living room. Introducing Big Screen Games, a party game experience where players use their phones as controllers - and play together on the big screen. Prepare for drawing with Dave, clashing colours and a devious chameleon.

name: Five Toons at Night
description: Five Toons at Night is upcoming Five Nights at Freddy's and Five Nights at Treasure Island fangame

name: Freddy's Job : Old Pizzeria
description: Sin descripción

name: Sora to Kimi Iro
description: Sora to Kimi Iro is a visual novel with a trial version released for PC on November 3, 2023.

name: Alien Shooter
description: Evil aliens captured secret military base. You have to destroy them all and save the world. You can use different weapons, such as guns, bombs and flamethrower. Uncompromised combats during many levels await you in this game.

name: SomaCube
description: Soma Cube is a challenging 3D puzzle game also known as "Soma Cube Puzzle". The main goal of the game is to use a series of differently shaped blocks to piece together a complete 3D shape.

name: Gay Sex Adventures: Episode 1
description: A steamy Visual Novel featuring HD graphics in beautiful decor. Tony embarks on his wild Sex Adventure as he rediscovers life as a single guy. Episode 1 brings him to the local gay bar, to check it out, only to end up taking the cute bartender home after messing with him in the bar's toilet.

name: Sonic X: Speed Spotter 2
description: Sonic X: Speed Spotter 2 is a Sonic X-themed game of spot the difference, and the sequel to Sonic Speed Spotter.

name: VoiceActress
description: Seiko is an ordinary and humble student, and at home, she is an online voice actress. Because of her father's work, Seiko's room also has good sound insulation equipment In the work of voice actress,

name: Sniper Elite VR: Winter Warrior
description: Grab your rifle and make your way behind enemy lines with Sniper Elite VR: Winter Warrior.

name: Petualangan DivineKids
description:
Adventure RPG game of Abe, Bambo, Cici against the dark witch Indra who will resurrect the 1000 year old Demon. Interesting story, exciting battles, animated with Indonesian language, fun to play.

The Divinekids Adventure was the first Indonesian game to be awarded the MURI award in 2004.

name: Uncharted Lands: Beginning
description: old school dungeon crawler in pseudo 3d graphics from 90's

name: Weekend Solitaire: Summer village
description: It's time to take on Solitaire Challenge. Pass the game's several stages. Conquer challenging card configurations and take on a big, vibrant game with several levels of varying difficulties. Overcome challenges, create combinations, and get bonuses.

name: Where Dreams Die
description: Where Dreams Die is an upcoming FNaF fangame

name: Halloween Puzzle
description:
Immerse yourself in a dark and mysterious world as you explore the enchanting atmosphere of Halloween in this classic card matching game. With four distinct difficulty levels to choose from – Easy, Medium, Hard, and Expert – get ready for a thrilling adventure.
Amongst the cards featuring ghosts, witches, cauldrons, and more, you'll need to exercise your memory and concentration to uncover the perfect matches. You can start with Easy for a pleasant introduction, but true mastery awaits you in the challenging Expert mode.
The Halloween ambiance will captivate you at every level, adding an extra layer of excitement to the game. With spooky themes and mind-bending pairings, this game will provide hours of fun for you and your friends. Flip the cards, make the matches, and unveil the secrets of this mystical world

name: Sonic X: Speed Spotter 3
description: Sonic X: Speed Spotter 3 is a Sonic X-themed game of spot the difference, and the sequel to Sonic X: Speed Spotter 2.

name: Mindwave
description: Make your way to the top of Mindscape Tower and delve into the minds of your opponents in a cerebral microgame frenzy!

name: Overwatch 2: Season 8 - Call of the Hunt
description: Overwatch 2 Season 8: Call of the Hunt adds the newest tank Hero, Mauga, along with Beast Hunter-themed skins in a new Battle Pass.
